### Brief description

This package extends the method of Cori et al (2013), adding Bayesian imputation of missing symptom onset dates, imputation of infection times using an external estimate of the incubation period, and an adjustment for reporting delay. This was never submitted to CRAN, no further action taken. The only documentation related to this package is in the [Lytras et al. preprint](https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.09.19.20198028v1).


### Methods

This package contains the following methods:

- [fixed sliding windows](methods_time.qmd#sec-fixedwindow)
